title: Is Cash App Starting to Rival Apple Pay?
desc: The short answer Is Cash App starting to rival Apple Pay? The short answer is no. One is the global, market-leading digital wallet, and the other is a US payment platform. However, the latter has grown to rival both PayPal and Venmo, becoming one of the country’s biggest personal payment solutions and now making inroads into their markets. However, despite being big news in the US, Cash App does not have the same ubiquitous coverage as Apple Pay. It has recently withdrawn operations from some markets, including the UK.
